kr.ac.kaist.se.simulator

Class Environment

  • java.lang.Object
    • kr.ac.kaist.se.simulator.Environment

  • public final class Environment
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulator for System of Systems World Class Raise actions that are handled by CSs Send a message to CSs that the action is raised

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Environment(BaseConstituent[] CSs, BaseAction[] actions) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void generateAction()
      Randomly generate actions that are not raised Raise the action whose status is exactly not_raised If the number of actions to be raised is 0, then no action is raised.
      void notifyCS()
      Notify randomly generated actions to CSs Send a message that the actions are raised The CS which got the message will modify their available action list

      void reset()
